title: im so lucky
body:
paladin steals my effigy, uses hero power like a dumbass.  i kill it, he gets the 3/1 with windfury...  wins the game off that.  i had lethal next turn, and it gave him exact lethal.

edit:  and i didnt have a choice in leaving it on the board or not, he had a 7 attack minion that i had to kill that turn.  literally any other 1 drop does nothing for him.
